word_mean: 胆红素：为一种胆汁色素，主要为红细胞的血红蛋白在网状内皮细胞中，降解成的血红素的分解产物，但也可由其他血红素色素如细胞色素分解而形成。正常胆红素在血浆中与白蛋白结合成复合物而循环，被肝细胞摄取结合成二葡糖醛酸胆红素，成为由胆汁中排出的水溶性色素。胆汁滞留患者，二葡糖醛酸胆红素堆积在血液和组织内，由尿中排出
未结合的胆红素不由尿中排出。胆红素浓度高可导致黄疸

sentence.Network_en: The amount of bilirubin manufactured directly relates to the quantity of blood cells destroyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 胆红素产生数量与经细胞破坏的数量直接有关.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the changes of plasma bilirubin level in asphyxial neonates.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨窒息新生儿血浆胆红素水平的变化.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 胆红素(Bilirubin)是血液中红血球的血红素代谢后的废弃物。主要由血红蛋白转化而来，一克血红蛋白能生成34mg胆红素。
由于血液中胆色素(bilirubin)浓度太高，往往会经由尿液来排除部份胆色素，因此在黄疸严重之犬只的尿液检查中，往往可见到高胆色 …
溶血（Hemolysis）能改变血清胆红素（Bilirubin）、AST、ALT、BUN、AP、LDH、钾（Potassium），氯（chloride）和磷（phosph…
...us)：母体与胎儿血型不同会引起溶血，因而导致胎儿胆红质(bilirubin)过高，进而引起黄疤，严重的黄疤会损及中枢及周围神经。

医学制药词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... indigitation 套迭 indirect bilirubin 间接胆红素 indirect division 间接分裂.
...酶的作用下与葡萄糖醛酸结合形成葡萄糖醛酸酯，或称为结合胆红素(Conjugated bilirubin)。
生物学词汇 C ... conjugated bile acid 缀合胆汁酸 conjugated bilirubin 缀合胆红素 conjugated double bond 共轭双键.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: coined in German from Latin bilis 'bile' + ruber 'red' + -in

means.word_mean: 1. an orange-yellow pigment in the bile that forms as a product of hemoglobin; excess amounts in the blood produce the yellow appearance observed in jaundice

auth_sentence.content: If your liver isn't working properly, waste products such as bilirubin may build up in your blood.
auth_sentence.res_content: If your liver isn't working properly, waste products such as bilirubin may build up in your blood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If your liver isn't working properly, waste products such as bilirubin may build up in your blood.

auth_sentence.content: For example, bilirubin is normally made from the regular break down of blood cells.
auth_sentence.res_content: For example, bilirubin is normally made from the regular break down of blood cells.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For example, bilirubin is normally made from the regular break down of blood cells.

auth_sentence.content: If bilirubin reaches dangerous levels, a type of blood transfusion called an exchange transfusion may be needed.
auth_sentence.res_content: If bilirubin reaches dangerous levels, a type of blood transfusion called an exchange transfusion may be needed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If bilirubin reaches dangerous levels, a type of blood transfusion called an exchange transfusion may be needed.
